name: Tetris4px
description:
Tetris4px is a classic tetris clon, but it moves 4pixels at a time, instead of typical Basic by-character movement.

It has in-game music, playing one beep note every 25frames.

It can be played by 1 or 2 players at the same time.

9 Different textures available for the pieces, blended using Over 1.

It is programmed in pure Basic for ZXSpectrum 48kb issue3

Contestant at Bytemaniacos "Concurso Basic 2023" https://bytemaniacos.com/web/?page_id=3998

In a few days, I will post some documents explaining techniques used and files packed in the .TAP

After BREAK you can see the code with GOTO 9500

Enjoy!
